page.title: 13CUSTOMS(CONTINUED)
page.content: Customs of the Forest of Dean. Carnivals(continued)This is a three day event which consists of competitions,exhibitions of crafts, stalls,entertainments and a fairground. Christmas.It is usual for the local silver bands to play through the streets of the nearest villages.The local part-time fireman at Cinderford and Coleford deck out a float with a Christmas theme and display it.Nearer Christmas Father Christmas travels with it around the villages.Local traders arrange for Father Christmas to visit Cinderford on the Saturdays leading up to Christmas and distribute sweets to the children.
